channel.title: [PI] please does any1 know how to do this?
channel.description:
ok so on my server i have a gate entrance into corp. players are just 3item'ing and specing it, and repeating how would i put a req. on the gate so you must be weilding so many items to enter?
like req on pk u must be wearing 3 items to attack some1 how would i do the same thing when players try open the gate they must be wearing the defined amount of items to gain access/passage through the gate?
can any1 help me please?
